metadata.Title: CVE-2017-16854 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Open Ticket Request System (OTRS) through 3.3.20, 4 through 4.0.26, 5 through 5.0.24, and 6 through 6.0.1, an attacker who is logged in as a customer can use the ticket search form to disclose internal article information of their customer tickets.

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.0.5-1').
